full_text:
Page 439

Ron DeSantis
Governor

August 6, 2019

Commissioner Rick Swearingen
Florida Department of Law Enforcement
2331 Phillips Road
Tallahassee, FL 32308

Dear Commissioner Swearingen:

Today, I received the attached letter from Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw. I am requesting that FDLE assume the criminal investigation regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

Also, I am requesting that FDLE initiate a preliminary inquiry into misconduct and allegations that go beyond the reported concerns with Jeffrey Epstein's work release.

Finally, please find attached my Executive Order reassigning this matter from Palm Beach County to the State Attorney for the Nineteenth Judicial Circuit of Florida, Bruce Colton.

Thank you for your prompt attention in this matter.

Sincerely,
Ron DeSantis
Governor

THE CAPITOL
Tallahassee, Florida 32399 • (850) 717-9249

DOJ-OGR-00024916

text_blocks.content: Great Seal of the State of Florida

Commissioner Rick Swearingen
Florida Department of Law Enforcement
2331 Phillips Road
Tallahassee, FL 32308
Today, I received the attached letter from Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw. I am requesting that FDLE assume the criminal investigation regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
Also, I am requesting that FDLE initiate a preliminary inquiry into misconduct and allegations that go beyond the reported concerns with Jeffrey Epstein's work release.
Finally, please find attached my Executive Order reassigning this matter from Palm Beach County to the State Attorney for the Nineteenth Judicial Circuit of Florida, Bruce Colton.
Thank you for your prompt attention in this matter.

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Governor Ron DeSantis to Commissioner Rick Swearingen regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The letter is signed by Governor DeSantis and includes a stamp of the Great Seal of the State of Florida.
